name: cotton-spore
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.x-y: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
